column9: To those who are having problems, the medication is no good after expiration date, not mixed properly, or not stored proplerly. If you are not getting an erection, check supply dates, then increase dosage.  If your erection is lasting to long, you can take a sudafed, a hot bath, and also, go for a brisk walk for about 30 minutes, and it will subside. Inject at a 45 degree angle staying away from the top of the penis, the side of the penis, and any blood vessels that are visible. Injecting the penis is not difficult, just take your time.
